de.undercouch.citeproc.helper.oauth

Interface AuthenticationStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileAuthenticationStore

    public interface AuthenticationStore
    Saves an OAuth access token
    Author:
    Michel Kraemer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getSecret() 
      String getToken() 
      void reset()
      Resets the contents of this authentication store
      void save(String token, String secret)
      Stores a new access token

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        String getToken()
        Returns:
        the stored access token's value or null if no token value has been stored yet

      • getSecret

        String getSecret()
        Returns:
        the stored access token's secret or null if no secret has been stored yet

      • save

        void save(String token,
          String secret)
   throws IOException
        Stores a new access token
        Parameters:
        token - the token's value (must not be null)
        secret - the token's secret (must not be null)
        Throws:
        IOException - if the values could not stored

      • reset

        void reset()
    throws IOException
        Resets the contents of this authentication store
        Throws:
        IOException - if the store could not be reset
